long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically check-in for Mihoyo games, including:
  + Genshin Impact
  + Honkai Impact 3
  + Honkai: Star Rail
  + Zenless Zone Zero
  + Tear of Themis
Features:
  + Set up once, keeps working automatically.
  + Manage games that need auto check-in.
  + Receive notifications on Discord.
Languages:
  + English Language Support
  + 日本語サポート
  + 支援台灣語言
  + Hỗ trợ ngôn ngữ Tiếng Việt
  + 한국어 지원
  + Русскоязычная поддержка
Beta Feature:
  + Automatically claim new Mihoyo games giftcodes

1.2.0.7:
  + Fix version bug prevent new entry

Discord: https://discord.gg/W8GF6XYzTC
